definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: I get twitches and shakes out of nowhere, I always lose my line of thought.
sentences.chinese: 我会平白无故地抽搐，总是忘记自己想说什么。

sentences.english: The cake maker all-overs a naked snake with the agitation rake without account.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者平白无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: Humans, on the other hand, get angry when they are flatly told they are stupid.
sentences.chinese: 人则不同，当他们平白无故被告知是傻瓜时会很生气。

sentences.english: After all, I can't dig a grave without reason. I'm no amateur gravedigger.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，我不能平白无故地去挖一个墓穴。

sentences.english: Why will this tree without any reason and without cause appear again?
sentences.chinese: 这棵树又为什么会平白无故的出现？

sentences.english: You are apt to be all revved up with no place to go.
sentences.chinese: 你倾向于平白无故地忙个团团转。

sentences.english: I was criticized without any reason.
But he should not be no reason to me Stories behind Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 但他也不应该平白无故地向我发飙。

sentences.english: It would be fun, Alex thought, to give Cora something for no reason at all.
sentences.chinese: 阿烈克心里想，平白无故送点什么给柯拉一定很好玩。

sentences.english: I don't know why he gave me money without rhyme or reason.
sentences.chinese: 我搞不懂他为什么平白无故给我钱。

sentences.english: People don't just disappear, Dean. Other people just stop looking for them.
sentences.chinese: 人不会平白无故失踪，只是另一些人放弃寻找了而已。

definition: variant of 平白無故|平白无故[ping2 bai2 wu2 gu4]
no cause, no reason (idiom); completely uncalled for
perfectly all right/without rhyme or reason
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to leave the matter at that/to be prepared to let go/to be willing to take things lying down

pinyin: yi1 er2 zai4 , zai4 er2 san1

definition: delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
